name: Retell AI
description: Retell AI is a platform that enables businesses to build, test, deploy, and monitor AI-powered voice agents for handling customer calls and tasks. These agents facilitate natural, responsive voice interactions, enhancing contact center operations. Retell AI offers a pay-as-you-go model starting at $0.07 per minute, depending on the selected voice and LLM configurations. An Enterprise Plan is also available, featuring reduced rates, custom concurrent call options, and premium support.
